General.Name: Believe SAS
General.Description: Believe S.A. provides music distribution and marketing services for artists and labels worldwide. The company's physical and digital distribution services include a range of digital music services and video streaming, as well as a network of physical distribution partners. It also provides brand partnership, video, synchronization, music publishing and additional services. Believe S.A. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
